entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beauceville 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: ESE 34 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
